name: Field Horse
description: A calm, dependable horse. Good for travel and patrol.

name: Black Hunter
description: Fast and loyal, bred in the forests near Malta.

name: Battle Boar
description: A muscular, armored beast known to charge into chaos.

name: Military Mare
description: Trained to ignore fear. Steady under fire.

name: Pack Donkey
description: Stubborn, but loyal. Carries more than its rider.

name: Farm Mule
description: Raised in village fields. Built for endurance, not speed.

name: Dapple Grey Stallion
description: Handsome and agile. A favorite among knights.

name: Old Road Horse
description: No longer fast, but still gets the job done.
